Once accepted, the line can be included in the invoice item along with your PDF invoice.\\n\\nInvoice can contain one or few lines depending on the number of projects you have worked under. So that, if you have been involved in few projects in reporting period, the lines will be generated separately for each of them.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Invoice creation step by step is described on our \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMSBCMPUB/Workflow+for+contractors\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"KB Page\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The invoice in SimplePay needs to contain at least one attachment. The form of the act and the application (or other supporting documents) is agreed in the appendix of the contract. The act and accompanying documents must be attached on the Platform in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"non-editable format\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (NOT in Word or Excel, BUT as a PDF file) and must be signed by both sides.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When the invoice is created on the platform, please make sure, that you have submitted the invoice.
